bug.author: yeukfu
bug.summary: Unexpected keyword argument 'max_cpus' in LocalTFRunner in benchmarks
bug.description: In many experiments in benchmarks folder (for example, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/blob/d5cb291509b8f7e876d38534a2f19989103656c7/benchmarks/src/garage_benchmarks/experiments/baselines/continuous_mlp_baseline.py#L44>continuous_mlp_baseline</denchmark-link> ), has an unexpected parameter , which make the experiments cannot run.
